meta.explain: Analyzed health product requirements and generated UI specification for landing page.

recommended_sections.name: Benefits
recommended_sections.purpose: Explain how product addresses pain points

design_recommendations.color_palette: calming blues and greens with warm accents
design_recommendations.imagery_style: lifestyle photography showing calm, successful professionals

data.rationale: Analyzed target audience needs for stress relief and emotional wellness. Recommended sections focus on building trust (ingredients, testimonials) while clearly communicating benefits. Design recommendations align with calming, professional aesthetic expected by target demographic.
